address: Rue Maurice Weishardt, Graulhet, Occitanie 81300, France
notes: Premium marine collagen specialist with dedicated Naticol® brand. High purity and quality marine collagen peptides from natural marine sources. Sustainable and traceable sourcing with strong innovation tradition. Benefits include skin health and beauty, anti-aging properties, hydration and elasticity, collagen synthesis support, and high bioavailability. Applications include cosmetics and skincare, nutraceuticals and supplements, functional foods and beverages, and pharmaceutical applications. Premium marine collagen specialist positioning with dedicated brand and sustainable practices.
